name: Ziprent

From rent collection and automated lease management to 24/7 maintenance coordination with trusted Bakersfield vendors, Ziprent handles it all. Backed by transparent flat fee pricing with no hidden costs or commissions, Bakersfield landlords gain a dependable, tech powered alternative to traditional property management.

name: Ascend Real Estate & Property Management
description: Ascend Real Estate & Property Management supports residential & commercial property owners and investors with full-service management and real estate solutions for the Greater Bakersfield area. Ascend is a full-service real estate brokerage and management company offering custom-tailored solutions for your investment properties that include everything from acquisitions to preparation to tenant placement to daily management. As a real estate brokerage, they can provide you with market insight that helps you to make an informed decision about your new investment property, including market comparables, a budget analysis to give you an idea of when you can achieve a return, and preparation services to get to the rental market sooner. Existing property owners also can receive a free rental analysis to provide an estimate on your property’s earning potential before you commit to becoming a landlord, allowing you to forecast your earnings. Ascend’s full-service management takes your vacant property and places a high-quality tenant who passes their in-depth screening requirements in it as soon as possible with a custom lease that ensures compliance with California’s strict Landlord-Tenant laws to help avoid costly issues down the road. Day-to-day management takes care of tenant relations and all aspects of being a landlord, allowing you to be hands-off while they collect the rent and coordinate maintenance to generate rental income for you to enjoy. Ascend also addresses lease issues like renewals with market-rate analysis and evictions that quickly return your cash flow with a new tenant.
management_fee: 6% of monthly rent or $85 – $185 per month minimum depending on the number of units
tenant_placement_fee: $250 per unit

description: Royal Palm Property Management offers full-service residential management to property owners throughout Naples and the surrounding areas. Royal Palm PM aims to minimize the headaches of self-managing your property, offering full-service property management that handles all of the daily responsibilities of being a landlord so you don’t have to. Their services begin with a complimentary rental analysis to outline your expected income, make recommendations on value-adding renovations, and prepare your property to be shown and leased. As part of their leasing services, their team creates a listing for your property, syndicates it across a number of major rental sites for maximum exposure, answers rental inquiries and conducts showings, screens interested applicants rigorously to ensure qualified tenants are placed, drafts the lease in compliance with Florida Landlord-Tenant laws, and escrows the security deposit. Placed tenants are guaranteed to stay for 6 months of their lease term, or they will be placed free of charge. In the case of an eviction, Royal Palm PM handles legal fees and court representation, ensuring the matter is resolved quickly so you can get back to earning passive income as soon as possible. During tenancy, tenants are provided a 24/7 online portal for anytime rent collection, communication, and maintenance requests, while owners have access to your own portal for viewing financial statements, inspection reports, and more.
management_fee: 7.9 – 11.9% of monthly rent (min. $1,000 for standard or $299 per unit for platinum)
tenant_placement_fee: 50 – 100% of one month’s rent, depending on plan

name: Premier Property Management
description: Premier Property Management offers both real estate and property management services for residential properties throughout Naples. Premier aims to help you achieve your investment goals without requiring you to invest the time, money, and effort it takes to maintain and grow your property investment. This includes buying assistance that helps you find investment opportunities for potential rental properties on the market, budgeting to help you set expectations and create a plan that achieves your ROI target, and property preparation services that help you get rent-ready quickly so that you can start collecting rent sooner. Current property owners can also receive a free rental analysis that helps price your property, with their leasing plans including preparing it to be leased (with or without renovation recommendations) and finding a tenant. These leasing services include marketing the property throughout all listing sites, the MLS, and local mediums to reach as many potential tenants as possible, plus in-depth tenant screening that uses over 10 points of data to help identify desirable tenants so that you can avoid headaches during the lease. All plans are 100% satisfaction guaranteed and require no payments until your property is rented, with customizable plans to fit your needs and budget. Premier’s management plans include everything necessary to maintain your property and keep your tenant happy without you lifting a finger, including all communication, rent collection, bill payment, maintenance coordination, 24/7 emergency support, lease renewals, eviction processing, and accounting which is accessible 24/7 through the owner portal.
